thread.title: A fun modern hotel in Paris
thread.title_full: A fun modern hotel in Paris - Review of Terrass'' Hotel by MH, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: binda88
title: A fun modern hotel in Paris
text: Stayed for one night at the start of our honeymoon. The hotel has an awesome rooftop bar which looks over Paris. Staff were friendly and helpful with seeing the local sites and booking restaurants for dinner. The room that we stayed in was modern and not cluttered. Bathrooms were clean. Only negative that I could say from our stay was at checkout, there was confusion about payment, breakfast and how many days we actually stayed. However all up we had a fantastic time at this hotel.
